key_risks: Economic sensitivity due to reliance on the cyclical construction industry
Supply chain vulnerabilities from raw material price volatility and potential disruptions
Competitive pressures in a highly competitive market
Legal and regulatory risks, including past lawsuits and integration challenges from acquisitions
controversies: Lawsuit involving sulfuric acid burns during a plant inspection (dismissed but highlights safety concerns)
Historical legal issues from a 2019 case involving a $45.7 million charge related to EFCO Corporation
environmental_issues: Potential increase in compliance costs due to evolving environmental regulations
social_issues: Workforce challenges, including past litigation and layoff-related discussions
governance_issues: Integration risks and financial liabilities from strategic acquisitions
